description: Featuring a stylized logo graphic, the Captive is your everyday, everything tee. Combining soft, durable, organically grown cotton with performance polyester fibres, the 240gsm fabric is great for fall and winter. The fit’s clean and trim, and gusseted underarms and light stretch give you freedom to move.
name: Arcteryx Captive ArcPostrophe Word SS T-Shirt - Mens
